byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and STUART ELLIOTT

abstract: Jeremy W Peters and Stuart Elliott Advertising column; Michael Wolff leaves his job as editorial director of Adweek, ending weeks of speculation about his departure.
snippet: Some speculation about Mr. Wolff’s departure was related to his aggressive coverage about the phone-hacking scandal that has engulfed the News Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Some speculation about Mr. Wolff’s departure was related to his aggressive coverage about the phone-hacking scandal that has engulfed the News Corporation.

headline.main: Ending Speculation, Michael Wolff Leaves Post at Adweek
headline.print_headline: Ending Speculation, Michael Wolff Leaves Post at Adweek
headline.seo: Michael Wolff Leaves Post at Adweek
